original_text: They used it to make the bases for the entrance to the tent of meeting, the bronze altar with its bronze grating and all its utensils,
korean_text: 이것으로 회막 문 기둥 받침과 놋 제단과 놋 그물과 제단의 모든 기구를 만들었으며

sentences.original_text: They used it to make the bases
for the entrance to the tent of meeting
the bronze altar with its bronze grating
sentences.korean_translation: 청동 그물과 함께 있는 청동 제단을
